awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE APACHE TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.ACTIVITIES:THIS ASSISTANCE PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE APACHE TRIBE TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.
SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES RELATED TO THEIR COMMUNITY, PROVIDE COMMUNITY OUTREACH AND EDUCATION, UPDATE GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM/GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM QUALITY ASSURANCE PROJECT PLAN (GIS/GPS QAPP), STAFF TRAINING, BUILD CAPACITY IN ESTABLISHING TREATMENT AS STATE (TAS) FOR 106.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FEDERAL FINANCIAL REPORT (FFR), PESTICIDES INVENTORY,  QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN (QMP), AND GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM/GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM QUALITY ASSURANCE PROJECT PLAN (GIS/GPS QAPP). THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE APACHE TRIBE.
